name: MediaMojos
tag_list: social-media, digital-media, mobile-media, content, distribution, business-strategies, entertainment
overview:
MediaMojos provides direction and solutions for Current and Emerging Digital Media companies and established Channels such as Mobile, Social Media, Out-of-Home, Digital TV, Internet, WiFi and beyond, which require new content, new thinking and new means of delivery & distribution in order to achieve success in domestic and international markets.

Our Strengths:

â€¢ Cross platform content development, production & distribution â€¢ Business strategy, development and management â€¢ Joint Ventures & Strategic Partnerships â€¢ Capital Financing â€“ IPOs and innovative New Financing Models â€¢ Market research, forecasting & budgeting â€¢ License negotiation & acquisition â€¢ Sponsorships â€“ Associations, leagues, networks and major brands â€¢ Market Analysis & Market penetration â€¢ Branded content development

MediaMojos provides strategic planning and product development and sales execution which enable companies to extend the reach and relevancy of their content and technology, driving market awareness, partnership relationships and increased sales.

Co-founded and led by Marjorie DeHey Daleo and Anthony Dillistone, MediaMojos currently has an Advisory Board of top executives who have held executive roles in top entertainment and media companies such as Disney, the Canadian Football League, ESPN, HBO, IBM, MySpace and Helio.
